languages.text: "Если верить магосам, он способен без устали просчитывать маршруты сквозь Имматериум, не рискуя подвергнуться скверне ввиду отсутствия человеческой души. Говорят, его мощь сравнима с Новатором навигаторского Дома. Похоже на то, что, встраивая в себя магосов с высоким пси-рейтингом в рамках Процедуры 0-Х, он расширял свои вычислительные мощности".

traits.locale_text: "Если верить магосам, он способен без устали просчитывать маршруты сквозь Имматериум, не рискуя подвергнуться скверне ввиду отсутствия человеческой души. Говорят, его мощь сравнима с Новатором навигаторского Дома. Похоже на то, что, встраивая в себя магосов с высоким пси-рейтингом в рамках Процедуры 0-Х, он расширял свои вычислительные мощности".

languages.text: "According to the Magi, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption, given the fact that it has no human soul. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently, Procedure 0-C was initiated by this mechanism to integrate Magi with high psychic potential in order to expand its own computational capacity."
languages.original_text: "Если верить магосам, он способен без устали просчитывать маршруты сквозь Имматериум, не рискуя подвергнуться скверне ввиду отсутствия человеческой души. Говорят, его мощь сравнима с Новатором навигаторского Дома. Похоже на то, что, встраивая в себя магосов с высоким пси-рейтингом в рамках Процедуры 0-Х, он расширял свои вычислительные мощности".

traits.locale_text: "It would seem that Null Caliph is akin to a Navigator in its ability to see into the warp. If Magi's theories are to be believed, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently using Procedure 0-Х to integrate Magi of a certain psychic profile was how this mechanism was expanding its computational capacity."

"The tech-priests that connected to it were punished for the intrusion with lethal banishment of the Motive Force. The only thing they managed to find out is that the spirit of the data-engine is not bound with the vows of compliance that would be commonly applied to a machine spirit of such power."

"It would seem that Null Caliph is akin to a Navigator in its ability to see into the warp. If Magi's theories are to be believed, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently using Procedure 0-Х to integrate Magi of a certain psychic profile was how this mechanism was expanding its computational capacity."

"According to the Magi, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption, given the fact that it has no human soul. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently, Procedure 0-Х was initiated by this mechanism to integrate Magi with high psychic potential in order to expand its own computational capacity."

"According to the Magi, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption, given the fact that it has no human soul. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently, Procedure 0-C was initiated by this mechanism to integrate Magi with high psychic potential in order to expand its own computational capacity."

"According to the Magi, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption, given the fact that it has no human soul. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently, Procedure 0-C was initiated by this mechanism to integrate Magi with high psychic potential in order to expand its own computational capacity."

"According to the Magi, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption, given the fact that it has no human soul. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently, Procedure 0-C was initiated by this mechanism to integrate Magi with high psychic potential in order to expand its own computational capacity."

languages.text: “根据贤者们的说法，这台机器没有人类的灵魂。它可以计算出穿越亚空间的航线，不需要休息，也不用担心腐化。贤者们声称，它的力量可以与导航者家族的大族长相媲美。很显然，0-C程序就是这台机器创造的出来的。它将许多拥有强大灵能潜力的贤者整合在一起，增强自身的计算能力。”
languages.original_text: "According to the Magi, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption, given the fact that it has no human soul. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently, Procedure 0-C was initiated by this mechanism to integrate Magi with high psychic potential in order to expand its own computational capacity."

traits.locale_text: “根据贤者们的说法，这台机器没有人类的灵魂。它可以计算出穿越亚空间的航线，不需要休息，也不用担心腐化。贤者们声称，它的力量可以与导航者家族的大族长相媲美。很显然，0-C程序就是这台机器创造的出来的。它将许多拥有强大灵能潜力的贤者整合在一起，增强自身的计算能力。”

languages.text: «Según los magos, puede calcular rutas a través del Inmaterio sin descanso ni miedo a la corrupción, dado que no tiene alma humana. Afirman que su poder es comparable al de un Novator de una casa navegante. Al parecer, el Procedimiento 0-C fue iniciado por este mecanismo para integrar magos con alto potencial psíquico con el fin de ampliar su propia capacidad de cálculo».
languages.original_text: "According to the Magi, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption, given the fact that it has no human soul. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently, Procedure 0-C was initiated by this mechanism to integrate Magi with high psychic potential in order to expand its own computational capacity."

traits.locale_text: «Según los Magos, puede calcular rutas a través del Inmaterio sin descanso ni miedo a la corrupción, dado que no tiene alma humana. Afirman que su poder es comparable al de un Novator de una casa navegante. Al parecer, el Procedimiento 0-Х fue iniciado por este mecanismo para integrar Magos con alto potencial psíquico con el fin de ampliar su propia capacidad de cálculo».

languages.text: 「賢人によれば、人間の魂がないことを考慮すれば、そいつは腐敗を恐れず、休まずに非物質世界を通過するルートを計算することができる。そのパワーは航宙士ハウスのノベイターにも匹敵するそうだ。明らかに、自らの計算能力を拡大するために、高い超能力のポテンシャルを持つ賢人と合体しようと、この機構がプロシージャー0-Cを始めたようです」
languages.original_text: "According to the Magi, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption, given the fact that it has no human soul. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently, Procedure 0-C was initiated by this mechanism to integrate Magi with high psychic potential in order to expand its own computational capacity."

traits.locale_text: 「賢人によれば、人間の魂がないことを考慮すれば、そいつは腐敗を恐れず、休まずに非物質世界を通過するルートを計算することができる。そのパワーは航宙士ハウスのノベイターにも匹敵するそうだ。明らかに、自らの計算能力を拡大するために、高い超能力のポテンシャルを持つ賢人と合体しようと、この機構がプロシージャー0-Xを始めたようです」

languages.text: « Les magos affirment que cette machine, étant dénuée d'âme humaine, peut calculer des itinéraires à travers l'Immaterium sans repos ni risque de corruption. Ils estiment que son pouvoir est équivalent à celui d'un Novator d'une maison de Navigateurs. C'est ce mécanisme qui a vraisemblablement lancé la Procédure 0-C, dans le but d'incorporer des magos à fort potentiel psychique dans ses propres capacités de calcul. »
languages.original_text: "According to the Magi, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption, given the fact that it has no human soul. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently, Procedure 0-C was initiated by this mechanism to integrate Magi with high psychic potential in order to expand its own computational capacity."

traits.locale_text: « Les magos affirment que cette machine, étant dénuée d'âme humaine, peut calculer des itinéraires à travers l'Immaterium sans repos ni risque de corruption. Ils estiment que son pouvoir est équivalent à celui d'un Novator d'une maison de navigateurs. C'est ce mécanisme qui a vraisemblablement lancé la Procédure 0-Х, dans le but d'incorporer des magos à fort potentiel psychique dans ses propres capacités de calcul. »

languages.text: "Den Magi zufolge kann er Routen durch das Immaterium berechnen, ohne Pause und ohne Angst vor Verderbnis, da er keine menschliche Seele hat. Sie sagen, seine Macht sei vergleichbar mit der eines Novators eines Navigatorenhauses. Offenbar wurde Prozedur 0-C von diesem Mechanismus initiiert, um Magi mit hohem psychischem Potenzial zu integrieren und seine eigene Berechnungskapazität zu erweitern."
languages.original_text: "According to the Magi, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption, given the fact that it has no human soul. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently, Procedure 0-C was initiated by this mechanism to integrate Magi with high psychic potential in order to expand its own computational capacity."

traits.locale_text: "Den Magi zufolge kann er Routen durch das Immaterium berechnen, ohne Pause und ohne Angst vor Verderbnis, da er keine menschliche Seele hat. Sie sagen, seine Macht sei vergleichbar mit der eines Novators eines Navigatorenhauses. Offenbar wurde Prozedur 0-X von diesem Mechanismus initiiert, um Magi mit hohem psychischem Potenzial zu integrieren und seine eigene Berechnungskapazität zu erweitern."

languages.text: "Magosların dediğine göre bünyesinde insan ruhu barındırmadığı için dur durak bilmeden yahut yozlaşmadan Tindiyar'dan geçen rotaların hesabını yapabiliyormuş. Kudreti, Rotacı Hanelerine mensup Rota Reisleriyle kıyaslanacak seviyedeymiş. Yüksek ruhsezi potansiyeline sahip Magosları bünyesine katarak kendi bilgisayım kapasitesini genişletmek adına 0-C Sayılı Prosedür'ü bu mekanizma başlatmış."
languages.original_text: "According to the Magi, it can calculate routes through the Immaterium without rest or fear of corruption, given the fact that it has no human soul. They claim that its power is comparable to that of a Novator of a Navigator House. Apparently, Procedure 0-C was initiated by this mechanism to integrate Magi with high psychic potential in order to expand its own computational capacity."
